title: Disgusting moment a PIGEON is filmed eating off counter of a popular Vietnamese restaurant
text:
A brazen pigeon has been filmed helping himself to a feast at a Vietnamese cafe in a southern Sydney suburb.

The bird was filmed at Destination Roll, in Mascot, walking around on top of uncovered trays of food and and pecking at the items.

The person behind the camera can be heard saying 'yuck' at the bird walking through the food.

The bird was filmed at Destination Roll in Mascot walking around on top of uncovered trays of food and and pecking at the items

A brazen pigeon has been filmed helping himself to a feast at a Vietnamese cafe in a southern Sydney suburb

Employees cannot be seen behind the counter to keep the bird away.

The footage was shared to popular western Sydney Instagram page auburn 2144.

While just the fact of wildlife being able to get to the food is off-putting enough, pigeons can also carry numerous diseases which can be transferred to humans.

Such infections include Salmonella, E. coli, and Histoplasmosis. Pigeons also can carry mites and fleas.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Destination Roll at Mascot and Bayside Council for comment.
description: A brazen pigeon has been filmed helping himself to a feast at a Vietnamese cafe in a southern Sydney suburb.
authors: Brett Lackey For Daily Mail Australia
